scripts.pretest: npm run reset && npm run init
scripts.test:dev:standart: TEST_TYPE=standart npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env -- cross-var k6 run -e PERMIFY_HOST=%PERMIFY_HOST% -e TEST_TYPE=standart permifyTest.js
scripts.test:dev:stress: TEST_TYPE=strees npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env -- cross-var k6 run -e PERMIFY_HOST=%PERMIFY_HOST% -e TEST_TYPE=stress  permifyTest.js
scripts.test:local:standart: TEST_TYPE=standart npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env.standart -- cross-var k6 run -e CONFIG_FILE=./%CONFIG_FILE% -e SUMMARY_FILE=./%SUMMARY_FILE% permifyTest.js
scripts.test:local:stress: TEST_TYPE=strees npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env -- cross-var k6 run -e TEST_TYPE=stress permifyTest.js
scripts.test:local: npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env -- cross-var k6 run -e TEST_TYPE=%TEST_TYPE% permifyTest.js
scripts.test:dev: npm run pretest && dotenv -e .env -- cross-var k6 run -e PERMIFY_HOST=%PERMIFY_HOST% -e TEST_TYPE=%TEST_TYPE% permifyTest.js
